description: The protagonist of the series, Tsunashi Takuto is a 15-year old boy who left the mainland to go to the Southern Cross Island in pursuit of a "fabulous school life". With a bright and positive personality, he easily makes friends with all the people in the school. Unbeknownst to all, he is the "Galactic Pretty Boy Tauburn", a person that has the ability to control a Cybody directly and unleash its true power. He uses his gift to fight the Glittering Crux Brigade in order to stop their plans to release the Cybodies to the outside world. During his fights he always finds a way to defeat the enemy cybody without harming the pilot themselves, and does not make any actions that would put the pilot in danger during his fight. Takuto has a habit of saying "it`s a pinch!" when he`s in trouble. He is the pilot of the cybody know as Tauburn and owner of two star swords, Emerald and Sapphire.
name: Tsunashi Takuto
